産業社会: (さんぎょうしゃかい) - industrial society
産業組合: (さんぎょうくみあい) - industrial association; industrial guild
産業組織: (さんぎょうそしき) - industrial organization
産業資本: (さんぎょうしほん) - industrial capital
産業資本主義: (さんぎょうしほんしゅぎ) - industrial capitalism
産業連関分析: (さんぎょうれんかんぶんせき) - interindustry relations analysis
産業連関表: (さんぎょうれんかんひょう) - interindustry relations table; input-output table
産業革命: (さんぎょうかくめい) - the Industrial Revolution
産毛: (うぶげ) - soft, downy hair (i.e. such as on one's cheek)/peach fuzz/fluff/pappus; lanugo; lanuginous/pappose/pappous
産気づく: (さんけづく) - to go into labor; to go into labour
産気付く: (さんけづく) - to go into labor; to go into labour
産環協: (さんかんきょう) - Japan Environmental Management Association for Industry; JEMAI
産痛: (さんつう) - labor pains; labour pains
産直: (さんちょく) - direct from the farm; farm-fresh
産着: (うぶぎ) - clothes for a newborn baby; baby clothes
産神: (うぶがみ) - guardian deity of pregnant women, newborn babies and one's birthplace
産立て飯: (うぶたてめし) - {Shinto} thanksgiving rice dish after childbirth
産経新聞: (さんけいしんぶん) - Sankei newspaper
産衣: (さんい) - clothes for a newborn baby; baby clothes
産軍複合体: (さんぐんふくごうたい) - military-industrial complex
甦える: (よみがえる) - to be resurrected/to be resuscitated/to be rehabilitated/to be revived/to be refreshed/to be restored; to be recalled (e.g. memories)/to be brought back
甦る: (よみがえる) - to be resurrected/to be resuscitated/to be rehabilitated/to be revived/to be refreshed/to be restored; to be recalled (e.g. memories)/to be brought back
甦生: (そせい) - rebirth; resuscitation; rehabilitation; reorganization; reorganisation; regeneration; resurrection; reviving
用: (você/mochi) - use , business, task, errand, engagement; use, purpose; for the use of ..., used for ..., made for ...; call of nature, excretion
用いて表す: (もちいてひょうす) - express ... in terms of ...
用いる: (もちいる) - to use; to make use of; to utilize; to utilise
用うる: (もちうる) - (lit. form of 用いる)  to use; to make use of; to utilize
用が有る: (ようがある) - to have things to do
用が足せる: (ようがたせる) - to make oneself understood (in some language); to be able to relieve oneself
用が足りる: (ようがたりる) - to do the job; to do the business
用たし: (ようたし) - running errands/going on errands; (transaction of) business/going about one's business; doing one's business (i.e. at the toilet)/going to the washroom; (esp. 用達)  purveying/purveyor
用に立つ: (ようにたつ) - to be of use (service)
用に足りない: (ようにたりない) - of no use; useless
用を足す: (ようをたす) - to take care of some business/to go on an errand; to relieve oneself/to do one's business/to go to the toilet
用不用説: (ようふようせつ) - Lamarckian evolutionary theory in which individuals lose characteristics that are not used and develop characteristics that are often used
用事: (ようじ) - tasks; things to do; errand; business (to take care of); affairs; engagement
用人: (ようにん) - manager/steward/factotum/person next in rank to the chief retainers and in charge of general management and accounting in a samurai family (Edo period); useful person
用件: (ようけん) - business; thing to be done; something that should be perfomed; information that should be conveyed
用土: (ようど) - soil for horticulture; soil for seed planting
用心: (ようじん) - care; precaution; guarding; caution
用心して: (ようじんして) - on one's guard
用心するにこしたことはない: (ようじんするにこしたことはない) - better safe than sorry; one should err on the side of caution
用心するに如くはない: (ようじんするにしくはない) - (proverb) Caution is the best policy
用心するに越したことはない: (ようじんするにこしたことはない) - better safe than sorry; one should err on the side of caution
用心に越した事は無い: (ようじんにこしたことはない) - You cannot be too careful
用心堅固: (ようじんけんご) - (yoji) very cautious (watchful, vigilant); taking every possible precaution
用心棒: (ようじんぼう) - bodyguard/bouncer/guard; bar (e.g. on a door)/bolt
用意: (youi) - preparation, arrangements, provision, getting ready, laying out (ex.: uma refeição)
用意にかかる: (よういにかかる) - to set about preparations
用意に掛かる: (よういにかかる) - to set about preparations
用意万端: (よういばんたん) - every preparation possible; all aspects of the preparation
用意周到: (よういしゅうとう) - (yoji) very careful; thoroughly prepared
用捨: (ようしゃ) - adoption or rejection; choice; separating the needed from the unneeded
